attributes.action: Cancel 2021 A Level and GCSE exams
attributes.additional_details: Students should have the opportunity of whether they want to sit exams or wish to get teacher assessed grades. This is unfair and we are in a worse situation than ever.
attributes.background: Due to the number of cases increasing drastically GCSE and A Level exams for next year should be cancelled as the Year 11’s and Year 13’s are in a worse position as last year as they have missed out months of learning which has a big and negative impact on our mental health and academic learning.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
